LanguageData.WoW_HighElf.label: high elf
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf.description: The High Elves, or Quel'dorei ("children of noble birth"), are a race descended from the Highborne night elves who left Kalimdor and settled in the Eastern Kingdoms, founding Quel'Thalas. The high elves were once a significant force on the continent, but in recent times their numbers have been dramatically reduced: almost 90% of their population in Quel'Thalas was slaughtered during the Third War.
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.WoW_HighElf.tools.3.label: head
